pages.text: geuleona geudeul-i geugeos-eul gakka iseo moggyeoghal ttaemyeon bulsinjadeul-ui eol gul-eun seulpeum-eulo gadeugchal geos-imyeo geu geos-i neohuiga guhadeon ihaengdoel yagsog iyo laneun malsseum-i deullyeool geos-ila

illeogalodoe nawa geuligo na wa hamkke han jadeul-eul hananimkkeseo myeolmangke hasigeona animyeon uliege eunhyeleul bepunda hadeolado gotongseuleoun eungbeollobuteo bulsinjadeul-eul nuga gujehal su iss-eulleonji neohuiga saeng-gag hae boassneunyo
illeogalodoe geubun-eun jabilousin bun-eulo ulineun geubunman-eul mid-eu myeo geubun-egeman uitaghanani neohuineunbunmyeonghi banghwanghaessdeon jaga nugu-inji alge doelila
illeogalodoe mul-i ttangsog-eulo seumyeodeul-eo mul-eul ilhge doeeoss-eul ttae nuga neohuiege heuleuneun mul-eul gong-geubha yeo jugessneunyo
nun yeonpilgwa geudeul-ui gilog-e geol-eo maengsehasa
geudaega michinjaga anin geos-eun junim-ui eunhyeloseo
meoji anh-a geudaedo alge doel geos-imyeo jeodeuldo alge doelila
sillo geudae junim-eun hananim-ui gil-eseo banghwanghaneun jawa bog-eum-eul bad adeul-ineun jadeul-eul gajang jal asineun bun-isila
geuleomeulo jinlileul geoyeoghaneun jadeul-ege giul-iji malla
geudeul-i sun-eunghaneun cheog hamyeo geu daega sun-eunghagileul geudeul-eun wonhago issnola
biyeolhan geudeul-ui maengsee gwileul giulji malla
modeun seonhaeng-eul banghaehago yeong-yeog eul neom-eo joeag-e gip-i ppajin jadeullo
nanpoghago jan-inhani modeun geos i jeojuseuleon taesaeng-ila
ineun geuga jaemulgwa manh-eun jasondeul-eul gajyeossgi ttaemun-inyo
hananim-ui malsseum-i geuege gye sidoel ttaemada geugeos-eun yes seonjodeul-eun uhwadeul-ilago malhayeossdeola
